author: kfogel
msg: * CHANGES (0.35.0): Michael Price pointed out that we really want BDB
4.2.50 or higher.

author: kfogel
msg: * CHANGES (0.35.0): Kevin Pilch-Bisson pointed out that auto-pruning
of BDB logs only works with BDB >= 4.2, so mention that.  Also,
make the notices more readable.

author: josander
msg: The Win32 installer will not install the debug files as standard anymore but
are still included in the distribution.
The user can choose to install the debug files during the installation or any
time later.
This saves around 88 MB at the end user's harddisk.
* packages\win32-innosetup\svn.iss: Changed accordingly.

author: kfogel
msg: * CHANGES (0.35.0): Start this section off with a couple of obvious
items, plus a prominent note about the reappearance of automatic
deltification.

author: kfogel
msg: Use a subpool, to avoid a pool cleanup gotcha introduced in r7979.
Thanks to Sander Striker for pointing out the problem.  He also sent a
patch privately, virtually equivalent to the one here, which was
reassuring.  Either the change is right, or we're both deluded in
exactly the same way.
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/version.c
(cleanup_deltify): Create a subpool, use it, destroy at end.
